metadata.title: CVE-2021-36568 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In certain Moodle products after creating a course, it is possible to addin a arbitrary "Topic" a resource, in this case a "Database" with the type"Text" where its values "Field name" and "Field description" are vulnerableto Cross Site Scripting Stored(XSS). This affects Moodle 3.11 and Moodle3.10.4 and Moodle 3.9.7.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
